mapper.select: SELECT * FROM thread a JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT t.thr_key as thr_key FROM thread t JOIN reaction r ON r.res_id = #{user_serial} and r.thr_key = t.thr_key) b ON a.thr_key = b.thr_key
SELECT emoji, res_id, thr_key, reg_id, reg_dt FROM reaction WHERE thr_key = #{thrKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reaction ( emoji, thr_key, res_id, reg_id, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{emoji}, #{thrKey}, #{resId}, #{regId}, SYSDATE )
